Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientToServerManager, Observer
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer, ClientToServerManager
Controller to handle events from the view and modify model in order of pattern MVC

    • countdownStart

      public void countdownStart()

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn​(java.lang.Boolean isLosingEnding)
      this method takes in the player that has ended his turn, reset his status and take the successor, calculate his available pawns then send theis coordinates to their player. if there are no pawns available notify the owner that he has loosed the game because he can't do any action
      Parameters:
      isLosingEnding - this must be set true if the player "nickname" has lost the game, in this case before picking the next player, the method remove the losing player from the game info this must be set false if is a normal end of turn

    • closeGameLobby

      public void closeGameLobby()
      close game lobby and send events, then send to the first player the event to choose a card for the game

    • endGame

      public void endGame​(java.lang.String winner)
      send events of end game and create a new lobby to manage another game
      Parameters:
      winner - nickname of the winner

    • newPossibleActions

      public void newPossibleActions​(java.lang.String nickname, int pawnRow, int pawnColumn)
      this method takes in the nickname of the player we want to know the new possible actions, if this player has some new actions then we send them to him, in case the player doesn't have any type of action then he lose the game
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player that wants his next actions
      pawnRow - the row of the pawn of the player that wants to know the new actions
      pawnColumn - the row of the column of the player that wants to know the new actions
